ramandeep singh wrote:
> 
> Hi,
> Thanks for the reply.
> This is requierd because our test suites are fairly
> big. So I would not like to add a new test suite every
> time.
> The idea is to identify which new methods have been
> added in a version.
> (I have written a doclet which does this, how can i
> integrate this doclet with junit)

If you're just /identifying/ which tests are new, then why aren't you 
using your source control system for that? I can ask Subversion to show 
me all the code changes since yesterday at noon, and by looking at the 
diff it's easy to see which tests I've added.
--
